name: Bomb Battering Battling B.o.B. the Bad Bot
name_original: Bomb Battering Battling B.o.B. the Bad Bot
description:
Quinby  the Mad Scientist and B.o.B. battle it out in a game of hot-potato-stick-of-dynamite! Who will walk away in one piece in this player vs. player game of reflexes and adapting to the ways of the chaotic explosive about to blow? The bomb moves faster and faster in unpredictable paths, so watch out!

Player 1 controls

movement: WASD

action : E

Player 2  controls

movement: arrow keys

action: spacebar

Game controls

esc/backspace to return to menu from game scene

Team members and their roles:

monapink - SFX and OST

Ted21219 - Programming and UI design

StardustAvalanche - Visual art

Aphushiro - Programming
